name: PokemonShowdown - Black/Orange Skin
description:
I like orange as an accent color, and it goes well with black.
I also tried to make it not gaudy compared to some other ones.
Battle screen revamp coming soon!
obsoletion_message: I don't host the server anymore, so this is pointless to host. It may return as a style for pokemonshowdown in general.

discussions.name: Why can't I see my opponent's pokemon?
